title: Jaakiradhai Song Lyrics Yudham
stanzas:
Jaakiradhai Song Lyrics Yudham (Dangal)

Hey nikkarrum 
tea shirtum potuthaan
varudhe cyclone-u (2)

oorellam phoneu
potuthaan puli ingae
puyalaa varudhunu sollu

hip hipovaai kaattipo
nalla thattipo
iva kaeli kindal
sagichikka maattaa

un ezhumba odachiduvaale
norukiduvaale
minnal pola thaakki
modhi jaichiduvaale
saachiduvaale 
saachiduvaale

aaththi jaakiradhai jaakiradhai
aaththi jaakiradhai (4)

un aanavatha 
sutta erichiduvaale
mudinja ivala nerungidu

oru inch-u tape-ula
alappaale un thenaavata
nee adangudaa
vaale narukkiduvaale
naadi narambu sulukeduppaale

iva kaeli kindal
sagichikka maattaa
un ezhumba odachiduvaale
norukiduvaale
minnal pola thaakki
modhi jaichiduvaale
saachiduvaale 
saachiduvaale

aaththi jaakiradhai jaakiradhai
aaththi jaakiradhai (4)

speedu super fastu kannu
kushthi podum chinna ponnu
bootu lesu kattinadhum
..ippo sirutha pola
paanji aala muttu
jaichi medal kottuvaa

maatuna pandhaaduvaa
thullunaa endu card-u poduvaa
neeyum kan simittum nerathula
minnal vettaaga sittaaga
ava maranjiduva 
thuppaakki thoattaava
iva over take seivaa

iva kaeli kindal
sagichikka maattaa

un ezhumba odachiduvaale
norukiduvaale
minnal pola thaakki
modhi jaichiduvaale
saachiduvaale 
saachiduvaale

aaththi jaakiradhai jaakiradhai
aaththi jaakiradhai (4)

seo.title: Jaakiradhai Song Lyrics Yudham
seo.description: Get the complete Jaakiradhai Song Lyrics Yudham  from Yudham. Read the lyrics penned by Rajesh Malaravannan and composed by Pritam and sung by Raftaar. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Rajesh Malaravannan, Yudham, Pritam, Raftaar, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
